meanings.definition: The area or land alongside a road.
meanings.sent1: I saw a beautiful flower blooming by the roadside.
meanings.sent2: We stopped at the roadside to take a break during our road trip.
meanings.sent3: The roadside was like a colorful garden with all the different flowers growing there.
meanings.sent4: The roadside stretched out like a welcoming path beside the busy highway.
meanings.sent5: The roadside was filled with the sweet scent of wildflowers in bloom.

meanings.definition: A place or location situated next to a road.
meanings.sent1: The roadside cafe served delicious coffee to tired travelers.
meanings.sent2: The gas station was conveniently located on the roadside for easy access.
meanings.sent3: The roadside seemed to whisper secrets to those who passed by.
meanings.sent4: The roadside stood silently, a loyal companion to the winding road.
meanings.sent5: The roadside was a familiar sight, always there to guide us on our journey.
